verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Have you considered him who denies the religion?
verse.verse_2: It is he who mistreats the orphan.
verse.verse_3: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
verse.verse_4: So woe to those who pray.
verse.verse_5: Those who are heedless of their prayers.
verse.verse_6: Those who put on the appearance.
